ZONE_SELECTION_DESC: Select which Roon zone this Volumio device should monitor and control. This allows you to use multiple Roon zones without conflicts.
SELECT_ZONE_DESC: Choose the zone you want to control from this Volumio device
ROON_RADIO_DESC: Roon Radio automatically continues playback with similar tracks when your queue ends. Enable this to let Roon create an endless stream of music based on your listening.
AUTO_RADIO_DESC: Automatically play similar music when your queue ends
